content.rendered:
Tickets

From single-day tickets to VIP experiences, there’s something for everyone at Orlando’s Signature Event.

Exclusive offer for Mastercard® cardholders.

Save 10% on tickets when
you use your Mastercard*

VIEW TICKETS

General Admission

Grounds Tickets

Good for One Day, Tuesday – Sunday

Follow your favorite PGA TOUR players along every hole with grounds-only access to the tournament.

Children 15 and under get in free of charge, with an accompanying ticketed adult.

Buy With
Buy Tickets

Included:

Enhance your Experience

White Claw Fan Deck

Get Even Closer in 2024

Featuring the return of the player walk along the 16th tee, you’re guaranteed to get up-close-and-personal views of your favorite PGA TOUR pros. Special food truck offerings will be available for purchase only to guests in the White Claw Fan Deck. Plus, new shade structures will enhance your all-day viewing experience. With drinks available for purchase, the White Claw Fan Deck has everything you need to stay cool while the play heats up.

Buy With
Buy Tickets

Included:

Enhance Your Experience

Mastercard Palmer Patio

Enjoy premier seating with an up-close view of golf on #14 green at the Mastercard Palmer Patio. Meet and mingle with friends and fans alike to enjoy amenities like air-conditioned indoor seating, TVs for viewing the live broadcast, and upgraded restrooms. Food and non-alcoholic beverages are included; alcoholic beverages are available for purchase only with a Mastercard. Tickets are day-specific and include admission to tournament grounds.

Tickets available exclusively for Mastercard cardholders*

Friday & Saturday Sold Out

Children 5 and under can accompany a ticketed adult. All other youth must have a Palmer Patio ticket to get into the venue.

Buy With

Included:

The Ultimate Experience

Orange Grove

All New for 2024

The Orange Grove is not just an experience –– it’s a destination. Steeped in Bay Hill history and featuring unrivaled premium amenities, including access to the storied Clubhouse, the Orange Grove is the Arnold Palmer Invitational at its sweetest.

Your All Inclusive Ticket Includes:

  • Tournament grounds admission
  • Daily access to the Bay Hill Clubhouse
  • Access to Arnie’s at the Orange Grove
  • All-inclusive food and beverage service
  • Access to private greenside seating on No. 9
  • Available parking (included in 4-day Tournament Experience package)
  • Company recognition on Sponsor Board
  • Questions on this package? Call 407-876-2888
Buy Tickets

Included:

Special Offer

Complimentary Junior Tickets

Courtesy of Primrose Schools

In Partnership with Primrose Schools, API offers all children 15 and under free grounds access with an accompanying ticketed adult. For all other ticket offerings, including hospitality, children 5 and under may accompany a ticketed adult into those areas.

Included:

For Those That Serve

United States Military Ticket

In partnership with Armed Forces Vacation Club

In partnership with the PGA TOUR’s Birdies for the Brave military outreach initiative, The Arnold Palmer Invitational presented by Mastercard is proud to offer a special complimentary ticket allotment for active duty, retired, reserve, and National Guard members in addition to a special allotment of discounted tickets for veterans.

Everyone must have a ticket for entry, including guests.

Active / Reserve
Veterans

Included:

For Aspiring Pros

Junior Clinic

Presented by Primrose Schools

Do you have a young golf lover in your family? Join Primrose Schools and the First Tee – Central Florida for a FREE Junior Clinic on Monday of tournament week. Kids of all ages will have a chance to hear from an expert and get tips for sharpening their golf game.

Registration Opening Soon

Register

Enhance Your Experience

Throwback Thursday

Thursday, March 7th

Follow the action from the ever-popular Landing off the 9th fairway while you sip complimentary Anheuser-Busch beer, pose with trophies from years past, and score some retro gear available only to you. Golf just got groovy – again!

Your All-inclusive ticket includes:

  • Beer from Anheuser-Busch
  • Tournament grounds admission for Thursday
  • Admission to Throwback Thursday event and covered, open-air venue from 12-3 p.m.
  • Exclusive throwback merch item
  • Throwback pricing on select food items
  • Multiple photo opportunities with past trophies
Buy With
Buy Tickets

Included:

Enhance Your Experience

Wine & Dine on 9

Friday, March 8th

You don’t have to be a golf enthusiast to love this food and wine special event. Enjoy fine wine from Kendall-Jackson and delectable appetizers from some of Orlando’s top restaurants.

Your All Inclusive Ticket Includes:

  • Your all-inclusive ticket includes:
  • Tournament admission for Friday
  • Admission to event, 2-5 p.m.
  • Covered, open-air venue
  • Food and wine samplings
  • Signature commemorative wine tumbler

Children 5 and under may accompany a ticketed adult. All other youth must have a Wine & Dine ticket to get into special event.

Buy With
Buy Tickets

Included:

The VIP Treatment

VIP Wine & Dine on 9

Friday, March 8th

Get even more wine time with VIP admission to Wine & Dine on 9 presented by Kendall-Jackson. This early-access ticket provides entry to an exclusive, covered area with food and beverage table service.

Your All Inclusive Ticket Includes:

  • Tournament admission for Friday
  • Early admission to event, 1:30-5 p.m.
  • Food and wine samplings
  • Beer and soda
  • Signature commemorative wine tumbler

Children 5 and under may accompany a ticketed adult. All other youth must have VIP Wine & Dine ticket to get into special event.

Buy With
Buy Tickets

Included:

Enhance Your Experience

Birdies & BBQ

Saturday, March 9th

Located just off the 9th fairway at The Landing, take in the action while we serve up signature smokehouse fare and ice-cold beer.

Your All Inclusive Ticket Includes:

  • Tournament admission for Saturday
  • Admission to event, 12-3 p.m.
  • Covered, open-air venue
  • Smokehouse BBQ
  • Beer from Anheuser Busch
  • Signature commemorative koozie

Children 5 and under may accompany a ticketed adult. All other youth must have Birdies & BBQ ticket to get into special event.

Buy With
Buy Tickets

Included:

The VIP Treatment

VIP Birdies & BBQ

Saturday, March 9

The early bird gets the BBQ! This year, experience our special event as a VIP and get early access to an exclusive, covered area at The Landing.

Your All Inclusive Ticket Includes:

  • Saturday tournament admission
  • Early admission to event, 11:30-3 p.m.
  • Covered, open-air venue
  • Smokehouse BBQ
  • Additional craft beer options
  • Beer from Anheuser Busch
  • Signature commemorative koozie
  • Keepsake Corkcicle cup

Children 5 and under may accompany a ticketed adult. All other youth must have a VIP Birdies & BBQ ticket to get into special event.

Buy With
Buy Tickets

Included:

Getting Here

Daily On-Site Parking

Daily on-site parking fee per vehicle. Must purchase day specific pass. Tuesday and Wednesday parking is complimentary in Lot 10.

Thursday, Friday & Saturday Sold Out

Buy With
Buy Parking

Included:

Getting Here

General Parking

General parking available Thursday – Sunday at Universal Orlando. Guests can pay a fee to Universal Orlando directly at the gate. Includes shuttle service to the tournament.

6000 Universal Boulevard, Orlando, FL 32819

Included:

Starting November 22nd through the end of Cyber Monday (11/27), practice round tickets are reduced to $20. And in honor of Mr. Palmer’s 92 professional victories, Throwback Thursday tickets are available for just $92. These exclusive opportunities won’t be back again, so get your tickets today – and experience a bigger, better, BOLDER Arnold Palmer Invitational presented by Mastercard.

Buy Now

Ticket / Event Features

  • Admission

  • VIP Admission

  • Parking

  • Food & Non-alcoholic Beverages

  • Alcoholic Beverages

  • Enhanced Restrooms

  • Enhanced Viewing

*Offers exclusive to Mastercard cardholders. Tickets must be purchased with a valid Mastercard. All tickets sold on a first-come, first-served basis. Discounted Grounds Tickets and Palmer Patio offers end 3/10/24 at 5:00 pm ET or when tickets sell out, whichever occurs first. Offer subject to availability and offer may be modified or withdrawn without prior notice. Tickets are subject to terms and conditions thereon. Substitutions, cash redemption, returns and exchanges are not permitted. Mastercard is not responsible for transportation to or from the event. Event is rain or shine. Tickets are not refundable, not transferable and cannot be replaced under any circumstances. Void where prohibited. By participating, individuals agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions. Participants must adhere to venue rules related to Covid-19 regulations, if any.

Hospitality

Entertain at Orlando’s Signature Event.

Treat your guests to upscale food, great drinks, and air-conditioned views of the tournament action. Contact David Strahan, Director of Business Development, for all your hospitality and sponsorship needs.

Contact David:

HoSpitality Options
